markdownRemark.excerpt: OPTICAL INSTRUMENT  is an audiovisual & multidisciplinary piece interpreted by a group of collective artists called:  I-O . It consists of two chapters…
markdownRemark.html:
OPTICAL INSTRUMENT is an audiovisual & multidisciplinary piece interpreted by a group of collective artists called: I-O. It consists of two chapters Dysecdysis and Incorporo. Their presentations characterize for its electronic, visceral and experimental ambient sound. Adding up with its stunning and climatic psychedelic visual 3d performance.

In its beginning, I-O was launched as a solo EP from Josefina Barreix (Director), produced with Andrés Marino and published by FUNGI Records (nov 2017). During 2018 they performed in various spaces around Buenos Aires under scene. The team and the scenery adapting itself according to the space provided. The I-O collective is formed by artists from different disciplines: visuals, audio/sound, programming and scenic design.

chela

Scenic Design and Setting > Francisca Armando y Joaquín Oneglia

frontmatter.title: Instrumento Óptico
frontmatter.description: Multidisciplinary digital art project in which the installation scenery is exploited and the creation of a space intervened by the repercussions of the interaction between audio and visuals.
